title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: The bug is about accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed. Instead of returning an HTTP error 404, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content. This occurs when using the following download link: http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and access a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from this link: http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server
